summary: Relax by the hearth, knowing that if you catch fire the river is close by. QUEST+ Player HOME reward.
descriptionHtml:
[color=green][size=15][b]Riverhearth[/b][/size] PLAYER HOME +QUEST[/color]
[i]Relax by the hearth, knowing that if you catch fire the river is close by...[/i]

Riverhearth is a cosy house nestled in Riverwood. Located behind the Inn, just before a mountain path

There is a simple quest to win the house. Start by heading to the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood and talking to a certain \"Mary\"
Alternatively you could kill/pickpocket her for the key

It consists of two rooms. A groundfloor living area and a basement/storage. There is also a mysterious locked door, currently inaccessible but a part of a bigger (WIP) questline. The basement is a hideaway - thus the door is hidden, just look a little more carefully inside your house.

Facilities include: Permanent chests, Cooking pot, Smithing anvil, Workbench, Grindstone, Alchemy bench and enchanting bench.


[color=green][size=13]Installation[/size][/color]
Drag the .esp file Riverhearth Home to the Data folder of your Skyrim directory = C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
then when openning skyrim in the splash click [Data Files] and ensure \"Riverhearth Home\" has a ticked box.
Alternatively use NMM and let it do it for you =)


[color=green][size=13]Known Issues[/size][/color]
The dialogue text with Mary sometimes runs too fast. However this does not detract from the quest. Working on a fix

This mod will conflict with any other that places objects which exist in the same spot as Riverhearth


[color=green][size=13]Permission[/size][/color]
Please do not redistribute without my permission.

SPOILER: Wonder why Mary was so quick to give you the house? Keep track of this file to see what that mysterious door leads to [i]hint:[/i]more quests?
